actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-341.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2992) to authorize appropriations for the fiscal years 1984 and 1985 for international security and development assistance and for the Peace Corps, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2992 (foreign assistance programs).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2992) to authorize appropriations for the fiscal years 1984 and 1985 for international security and development assistance and for the Peace Corps, and for other purposes.
